text: Now, to summarize what I think our course of action should be. First, to avoid the Thetans like the plague, for they must not find us out! Second, to tread pretty warily among our own people, finding out just how much freedom we can take with safety. And third, to study these damned Thetans. We must learn all we can about them.
handwritten_text: Now, to summarize what I think our course of action should be. First, to avoid the Thetans like the plague, for they must not find us out! Second, to tread pretty warily among our own people, finding out just how much freedom we can take with safety. And third, to study these damned Thetans. We must learn all we can about them.
